detaileddescription.para: (Insert text describing steps required to integrate the application with a CFS system. This should include: 1) Description of application configuration parameters that may need to be modified. For example, questions that a systems integrator needs to have answered before the application can be successfully integrated
The first step in deploying the PRMLIB application is to do stuff.
The prmlib_mission_cfg.h file, the prmlib_msgids.h, and the prmlib_perfids.h files are tailored for the mission. These are built into the application during compilation.

In the prmlib_platform_cfg.h file, there are configuration parameters that control PRMLIB application behavior. This should be tailored to the specific platform needs. This behavior is built into the application during compilation.
